trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma lista ordenada de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A TimerEventSubscriptionCollection represents the queue of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> objects associated with a workflow instance and provides methods to manage this queue.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um TimerEventSubscriptionCollection representa a fila de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>objetos associados a um fluxo de trabalho de instância e fornece métodos para gerir esta fila.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions are ordered in the queue based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values; those with smaller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values are positioned before those with larger <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: Subscrições estão ordenadas na fila com base nos respetivos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>valores; as mais pequenos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>valores são posicionados antes das com maior <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>valores.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods provided by this class to manage the collection of active timer event subscriptions exposed by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> for each workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar os métodos fornecidos por esta classe para gerir a coleção de subscrições de eventos do temporizador de Active Directory exposta pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty>para cada instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty>

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A> to add or remove subscriptions from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A>para adicionar ou remover as subscrições da fila de temporizador.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Whenever the first element in the timer queue changes, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> is called to cancel the timer event that was previously at the beginning of the queue and schedule the new timer event.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que o primeiro elemento da fila de temporizador é alterado, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>é chamado para cancelar o evento de temporizador que era anteriormente no início da fila e agendar novo evento de temporizador.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> para a fila de temporizador.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>para a fila de temporizador.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: Subscrições na fila são posicionadas com base na respetiva <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valores; os valores mais pequenos são posicionados à frente os valores maiores.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the new subscription is added at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to cancel the timer event that was previously at the beginning of the queue and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> is called to schedule the new timer event.
trans-unit.target: Se a nova subscrição for adicionada no início da fila, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é chamado para cancelar o evento de temporizador que era anteriormente no início da fila e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName>é chamado para agendar o novo evento de temporizador.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Add locks the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> before adding the new subscription and is, therefore, thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona bloqueios o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>antes de adicionar a nova subscrição e é, por conseguinte, seguros para threads.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> to add to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> para adicionar a fila de temporizador.

trans-unit.source: item is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: itemé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref> elements to an existing one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified array index.
trans-unit.target: Copia o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref> elementos existente unidimensional <xref:System.Array>, começando no índice de matriz especificada.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: CopyTo is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: CopyTo é seguros para threads.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos elementos copiada a partir de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>tem de ter a indexação com base em zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero `array` em que copiar começa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> objects in the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> objetos na fila de espera do temporizador.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> objects in the queue.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> objetos na fila.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um enumerador que itera através de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Acesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>está sincronizada; no entanto, ao enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança de thread.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador permanece válido desde que a coleção permanece inalterada.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Caso sejam feitas alterações à coleção, como adicionar, modificar ou eliminar elementos, o enumerador está irrevogavelmente inválido e o respetivo comportamento não está definido.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador não tem acesso exclusivo à coleção; Por conseguinte, a enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança de thread.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> during the entire enumeration by using <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, pode bloquear a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>durante a enumeração toda utilizando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso à <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref> é sincronizado (seguros para threads).

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Acesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>está sincronizada; no entanto, ao enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança de thread.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção está sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção, o que faz com que o enumerador acionar uma excepção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, pode bloquear a coleção durante a enumeração de toda ou detetar exceções resultantes das alterações efetuadas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>Devolve um objeto, que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar o acesso ao <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> indicating that access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> que indica que o acesso ao <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref> é sincronizado (seguros para threads).

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> at the beginning of the timer queue without removing it.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> no início da fila de temporizador sem a remover.

trans-unit.source: Peek is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Observar é seguros para threads.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> at the beginning of the timer queue or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the timer queue is empty.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> no início da fila de temporizador ou uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic) se a fila de temporizador está vazia.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> that has the specified subscription id from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> que tem o id de subscrição especificado da fila de temporizador.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> with the specified subscription id from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>com o id de subscrição especificado da fila de temporizador.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: Subscrições na fila são posicionadas com base na respetiva <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valores; os valores mais pequenos são posicionados à frente os valores maiores.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the subscription removed was the subscription at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to cancel the timer event associated with this subscription and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> is called to schedule a timer event for the subscription that is now at the beginning of the queue.
trans-unit.target: Se a subscrição removida era a subscrição no início da fila, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é chamado para cancelar o evento de temporizador associado a esta subscrição e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName>é chamado para agendar um evento de temporizador da subscrição que está agora no início da fila.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Remove is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Remover é seguros para threads.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> para remover.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> da fila de temporizador.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>da fila de temporizador.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: Subscrições na fila são posicionadas com base na respetiva <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valores; os valores mais pequenos são posicionados à frente os valores maiores.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the subscription removed was the subscription at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called to cancel the timer event associated with this subscription and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> is called to schedule a timer event for the subscription that is now at the beginning of the queue.
trans-unit.target: Se a subscrição removida era a subscrição no início da fila, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é chamado para cancelar o evento de temporizador associado a esta subscrição e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName>é chamado para agendar um evento de temporizador da subscrição que está agora no início da fila.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29> is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29>thread é seguro.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> to remove from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> para remover da fila de temporizador.

trans-unit.source: item is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: itemé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar acesso para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: SyncRoot returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: SyncRoot devolve um objeto, que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar o acesso ao <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Acesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>está sincronizada; no entanto, ao enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança de thread.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção está sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a coleção, o que faz com que o enumerador acionar uma excepção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> during the entire enumeration by using SyncRoot or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, pode obter o bloqueio de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>durante a enumeração toda utilizando as exceções resultantes das alterações efetuadas por outros threads SyncRoot ou catch.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: An object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto utilizado para sincronizar acesso para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Timer queue associated with a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Filas de temporizador associada a uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This queue contains time ordered <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> objects for a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Esta fila contém tempo ordenado <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> objetos para um fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
